Body:
"""
        Test that the right error is raised when an invalid signing algorithm
        is used.
        """
engine = crypto.CryptographyEngine()
args = b'', b'', b'', enums.PaddingMethod.PSS
kwargs = {'signing_algorithm': 'invalid', 'hashing_algorithm': enums.
    HashingAlgorithm.SHA_1, 'digital_signature_algorithm': None}
self.assertRaisesRegex(exceptions.InvalidField,
    "The signing algorithm 'invalid' is not supported for signature verification."
    , engine.verify_signature, *args, **kwargs)
